name: jdhenry105

name: heatbag
text: I think a better question is why does she think of England?

name: shmuckeles
text: because england is so hot

name: leia
text: Lie back and think of England... it's a saying for when you have to do something you don't particularly like. It originated because English women did not like having sex back in the day, so they would just do it for the continuation of their great nation. I think that speaks more for English men than it does the women.

name: tekende
text: A comment left by tekende was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by neaner, snitchy, heatbag, misscleo3861)

name: boredom_man
text: Urban legend attributes it to Queen Victoria, advising a young woman on how to get through the horrors of intercourse. That strikes me as pretty unlikely. The phrase caught on in the culture boom of the 1920s as a way of making fun of Victorian repression, and now lingers wherever uptight white people can be found.

name: choosebro
text:
Man, Prince Albert spent more time on top of Victoria than New South Wales does. Victoria was a serious sex-hound, she had 9 children and both a Scottish lover AND an Indian lover by the end of her reign.

I think that I'm going to have to go and lie down. All this thinking about Victoria has gotten me all flustered.

name: mercuri0us
text: I don't know if anybody here got your Australian states reference.  Good line, though.  Subtle.

name: woodenteeth
text: I know that reference. I know it.

name: saint
text: calm down.

text: Lie down and try not to think of England.

name: zeal
text: The Latino Health Crisis has a story all his own, a tale of battles won and loves lost in the dingy streets of Bogota and beyond.  The 2006 Great Outdoor Fight is but one of them.

name: abe
text: I wish to GOD that there was an actual amateur or professional fighter called "The Latino Health Crisis".  I would have started hitting the gym in '06 just to make it happen... but I'm not of Latin extraction.

name: pearced
text: I know where you can get some Latin extraction.

name: methadone
text: because she's taking her mind off her prostitution

name: dougthehead
text: Man, what's your problem?  I just called your wife a cheap whore, and you're acting all mad and shit.  People these days don't know how to take constructive criticism.

name: dropkickpikachu
text: The last frame is a perfect effigy of mortal anger.

name: saurkraus
text: I love that his head is apparently quivering more than his fists. That's true loathing.

name: untilyouaresonude
text:
Cast:

Leander = Henry Rollins
Latino Health Crisis = Danny Trejo
Perfect Ron Sipes = William H. Macy

...at least, that's my dream.

name: presterjohn
text: Danny Trejo is the breathing embodiment of Mexican asskickery. Just reading his imdb trivia page will cause hair to sprout from your chest.

name: zeal
text: If there is a man rawer than Danny Trejo, I don't want to meet him.  Trejo is raw enough for his very own Great Outdoor Fight.

name: cbtbone
text: The Google Image Search Engine supports your theory by having Danny Trejo appear shirtless in 3 of its first 5 results.  That beats Britney Spears AND Paris Hilton.

name: cbtbone
text:
...and yes I hesitated before doing google image searches for spears and hilton.

...it was for research...

name: wehavemagnums

name: tekende
text:
Yeah, I'm having trouble getting over it right now. It's so awesome that its effects on my mind cannot be put into words.

I mean god-DAMN. The Latino Health Crisis , people!

text:
Thank you, Snitchy. Thank you for laming every single comment on this page. I don't know if you were making a statement if the simple thought of being able to act like a cunt with no real consequences caused you to have a malevogasm. All I know is, you are a dick.

Dick.

text: The Latino Health Crisis rocks the pince-nez shades.  Never would have thought he and Cornelius had common fashion DNA.

name: fermatprime
text: "asshole shit motherfucker" has entered my vocabulary. that is one of many things that makes this strip a solid 5.

name: woodenteeth
text: Anyone else think that Leander should be RB's long lost brother. Does anyone else think that would be the raddest thing on the planet. RB finally getting someone that is not an turd biscuit from his genetic line.
